raw_body:
JAYAH – MOHAMED OUSMAN passed away on Tuesday,​ 13th February at his residence. Inna lillahi wa’inna ilayhi Raji’oon. Beloved husband of Ghnei Anvarin Kartikani Jayah,​ loving father of Mohamed Khaleeq Zaman Jayah,​ Ghnei Aatiqah Zainab Jayah,​ beloved brother of Omar Jayah and Yasmin Packeer,​ beloved brother-in-law of Fazilet Jayah and George Packeer,​ beloved father-in-law of Bilal Nazim. Janaza leaves residence today at 9.30 a.m. for Jawatta Muslim Burial Ground. 300 A,​ Bopetta Road,​ Gothatuwa.
011040
